fields.name: Blueprints (2x):
fields.value: This ability maintains the ammo you had before being converted. Use during evening before voting ends. After voting ends, but before results release, learn the top 3 responders. Decide if they are added to the Vault and gain the Vault passive. You only lose ammo if players are added to the Vault. This ability becomes Locked when 8 or fewer players are alive.

fields.name: Vault (Locked, Passive):
fields.value: You have access to a factional chat with other Vault players. Your defense power is increased by 1.9x for purpose of attacks by non-Vault players (assuming at least 1 other Vault player is alive). You are immune to any negative effects potentially triggered by your messages during the day phase. During the day, a majority vote of Vault players (in the Vault factional chat) may remove this passive from you.

fields.name: Social Experiment:
fields.value: Control target player with the Vault passive to attack another player with the Vault passive with their attack power or 1.2x Attack Power, whichever is higher

fields.name: Deadly Interview (1x, Locked):
fields.value: ** Unlocked the first time a player with the Vault passive dies. During the day, choose a technical restriction for responses (described in 30 characters or less), which will be announced at the beginning of the evening to all Town and Unseen players. The top-scoring player to comply with this technical restriction will gain the Vault passive. In addition, you will astrally attack the lowest placing (non-unseen) player that didn't follow the technical

fields.name: Employee Discount (Passive):
fields.value: ** Triggered if you place in the top 3. You unlock the Vault passive.
